title: Messaging Library Export API: enforce approval-state + versioning rules in export payload

sections.text: Implement server-side validation so only Messaging Library assets in an Approved state are eligible for export, and ensure drafts/rejected items are excluded from all export responses. Add versioning metadata (e.g., asset_version, approved_at, updated_at) to the export payload and persist a stable external_id to support idempotent updates vs. new exports. Include clear error responses when a client requests export for non-approved or missing assets.
